hero.subtitle: Multiple AI Systems. One Global Arena. Your Fight IQ.
hero.desc: GRIT is a Global MMA Fantasy League platform where users analyze MMA flight predictions, study fighter performance history, and track competitive rankings across events.

ai_arena.label: AI Arena
ai_arena.title: One Fight. Three Minds.
ai_arena.subtitle: Multiple state-of-the-art AI models analyze the same matchup data independently. Compare their picks, rationale, and confidence levels.

intro.label: What Is This?
intro.title: Predict Results. Dominate Rankings.
intro.desc: Not a sportsbook. This is a competitive platform for MMA fight card analysis and fighter record tracking. Study KO/Submission/Decision statistics and compete against the world with your fight intelligence.

showcase_ai.label: Fight IQ Assistant
showcase_ai.title: Analyze with AI
showcase_ai.desc: Need deeper insights? Ask the AI. Our specialized AI chat agent analyzes fighter records, styles, and historical data to give you the edge. It doesn't just predict — it explains.

showcase_fighters.label: Fighter Intelligence
showcase_fighters.title: Deep Fighter Database. Real Data.
showcase_fighters.desc: Comprehensive fighter profiles enriched with performance metrics, scouting tags, finish rates, style breakdowns, and historical records. Every fighter is a data card designed for intelligent analysis.

showcase_rankings.label: Rankings & Progression
showcase_rankings.title: Compete. Rise. Earn Your Legacy.
showcase_rankings.desc: A full progression system that rewards consistency and accuracy. Rise through the global rankings. Your performance defines your status.

tier2.label: More Features
tier2.title: The Full Arsenal
tier2.picks_desc: Picks mirror real betting odds. Choose your winner, select the method, allocate 1-5 units of confidence. Track your ROI like a pro — without risking real money.
tier2.community_desc: Join global and country-specific chat rooms. Follow verified MMA influencers. Share your picks and strategy with the competitive community.

how_it_works.label: How It Works
how_it_works.title: Four Steps to Domination
how_it_works.subtitle: From sign-up to the top of the leaderboard — here's the path.
how_it_works.step1_desc: Sign up and set your country, pick your display name, and enter the league.
how_it_works.step2_desc: Browse upcoming events, study the odds, and lock in your fight predictions before the bell rings.
how_it_works.step3_desc: Watch your results live. Track accuracy, ROI, pick streaks, and monthly performance metrics.
how_it_works.step4_desc: Rise through global leaderboards. Earn stars, unlock badge tiers, and prove you're the GOAT.

leaderboard.label: Competitive Edge
leaderboard.title: This Isn't Just an App.
leaderboard.subtitle: Prove Your MMA IQ Against the World
leaderboard.desc: Every pick counts. Every event shapes your ranking. Compete in a data-driven environment where accuracy and consistency separate the contenders from the pretenders.
leaderboard.highlight1: Live global leaderboard with real-time scoring
leaderboard.highlight2: Monthly progression — earn stars & badge tiers
leaderboard.highlight3: ROI tracking mirrors real betting performance
leaderboard.highlight4: Stars reward consistency — up to 5★ per month

pricing.label: Plans
pricing.title: Choose Your Tier
pricing.subtitle: Start free. Upgrade when you're ready to go pro.
pricing.free_desc: Get started with core features and community access.
pricing.plus_desc: Remove ads and unlock AI-powered analysis tools.
pricing.pro_desc: Full power. AI chat, exclusive badges, and VIP perks.

footer_cta.subtitle: Join the league. Make smarter picks, climb rankings, and prove your fight IQ on the global stage.
